page.title: 09AMATEUR DRAMATICS IN PADSTOW
page.content: Padstow has its own Theatre Group called{The Kernow Players.}We meet every Tuesday at 7 o'clock at the { {Pollard Hall}in Barry's Lane.We have just bought the Pollard Hall ourselves so that we can design our own stage settings and leave them out during rehearsals and performances because we used to use the Church Hall but had to put everything away each time we used it. We raised the money to buy the Hall by putting on Shows and dressing up and performing at Fetes and other such functions.Our biggest production is always the{Christmas Pantomime.}On Tuesdays we rehearse different scenes and do some acting lessons then sing some songs.Suddenly it is 9 o'clock and its time to go home.
